articles.author: Imran Khan, Nakshab Khan
articles.title: Bengaluru News: BBMP Internal Report Blames Infosys Techie For Her Death After Rains - Times Now
articles.description: Bengaluru Infosys techie death: The BBMP's internal report has put the entire fault on the deceased techie. The report also stated that the victim ignored barricades and continued her journey towards the flooded underpass.

articles.title: WWDC 2023: Did Apple secretly file 'xrProOS' trademarks for rumoured VR/AR headset? - HT Tech
articles.description: Only a few weeks before Apple WWDC 2023, it appears that Apple is covertly applying for trademarks connected to its rumoured, but much anticipated, AR/VR headset.

articles.title: WhatsApp now lets you edit messages with a 15-minute time limit - TechCrunch
articles.description: WhatsApp now lets you edit messages with 15-minute time limit. Mark Zuckerberg announced the feature today on his Instagram Broadcast.
articles.content:
WhatsApp has finally announced one of the most anticipated features today message editing.

articles.title: Venmo targets young consumers and parents with new teen accounts and debit card - TechCrunch
articles.description: Venmo is introducing teen accounts, allowing parents to open a Venmo account for their teenagers so they can send and receive money.

articles.title: Humidity As Important as Scent for Attracting Pollinators to a Plant - Technology Networks
articles.description: Humidity is as important as scent in attracting pollinators to a plant, new Cornell-led research finds, advancing basic biology and opening new avenues to support agriculture.
